definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to catch up with England and surpass the USA (economic goal)

sentences.english: Real Madrid defender Gabriel Heinze has conceded he would be interested in playing Premier League football again.
sentences.chinese: 皇馬後衛海因策已經承認他可以再次享受英超足球。

sentences.english: Chelsea's win gives them a goal tally of 103 for the season - a Premier League record.
sentences.chinese: 切爾西單個賽季共進103個球，成爲了英超新記錄。

sentences.english: The Premier League and the Chinese Super League, however, could not be further apart. The Premier League currently broadcasts to over 600 million people across the world.
sentences.chinese: 然而，英超聯賽和中超聯賽就相去甚遠了。

sentences.english: "The Premier League is the best-marketed league in the world, " he added.
sentences.chinese: “英超聯賽是世界上最好商業化聯賽，”他補充道。

sentences.english: Pacheco's transfer continued a trend of teenagers leaving Barcelona for the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 帕切科的轉會沿襲了巴塞羅那青少年出走英超的傳統。

sentences.english: Now, in one of the game's great crucibles, the cross-examination comes.
sentences.chinese: 現在，一場英超最嚴峻的考驗，互相質問的時候來了。

sentences.english: There has not been a draw between the teams at Fulham in the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 英超歷史上兩隊在富勒姆的主場還未打成平局。

sentences.english: Italiani believes Zapata would be open to a move to the Premier League this summer.
sentences.chinese: 伊塔里尼相信薩帕塔會對夏天轉會去到英超很感興趣。

sentences.english: Mark Hughes has drawn 12 of his last 16 league matches as a manager.
sentences.chinese: 休斯在英超當主教練的近16場聯賽平了12場。

sentences.english: By Richard Clarke Emmanuel Eboue will miss the Premiership game with Blackburn on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 埃布將會錯過週日英超對布萊克本的比賽。

sentences.english: I believe away games will decide the destiny of the Championship this season.
sentences.chinese: 我相信今季英超冠軍的命運將會取決於作客比賽之上。

sentences.english: Cumulatively, the Premier League has the highest debt, followed by the Spanish Primera and then the Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 日積月累，英超有着最高的負債，然後是西甲和意甲。

sentences.english: It's all about Hull Cityand staying in the Premier League.
sentences.chinese: 現在我所有的事情就是幫助胡爾城留在英超聯賽。

sentences.english: Jose Mourinho is not expecting Chelsea to stroll to another Premiership title.
sentences.chinese: 穆帥預測本賽季要奪得英超冠軍也不輕鬆。

sentences.english: On the eve of their first season in the Premier League, Blackpool sign five players in one day to strengthen their ranks.
sentences.chinese: 黑池在他們首個英超賽季前夕一天內簽下了5名球員。

sentences.english: Manchester United have won eight of their last nine league games following a defeat.
sentences.chinese: 紅軍在安菲爾德近九場英超賽事，僅一場落敗。

definition: La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany
